Name: [Synergy] Jingling Bell
Desc: Bangboo ATK increases by <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> for each Combat Bangboo and Ally Bangboo in your squad.
Desc2:
When your pet presses it, a corresponding voice will ring out, such as "hug me," "feed me," and "play with me"...
The dog at the newsstand on Sixth Street also uses such bells, but the voice is not as sappy.
